author: Special Correspondent
text:
With the mercury level rising every day, rains are much sought-after. City residents may have to wait for another month for that fresh smell of damp earth as dry days are ahead.

According to the Meteorological Department, Chennai will continue to experience a maximum temperature of 34 degrees Celsius, which is two degrees above normal for the next few days. Weather bloggers too point out that Chennai will have to brace itself for a dry weather. Weather blogger Pradeep John who has a Facebook page Tamil Nadu Weatherman forecasts that chances are less for showers till May.

There is a possibility of showers in May over the city. “But, we still have to wait to see how intense and widespread these May showers will be. As of now, conditions are ideal for showers in May and we can track the weather pattern better by April-end,” he said. However, interior regions of the State are likely to get showers this month. Mr. John recalled that Chennai experienced cyclonic storm in May during 2004 and 2010.

“In 1990, a super-cyclone hit in May when the city received nearly 400 mm rainfall,” he said.
title: Weather blogger predicts possibility of May showers
